alert.note: Alert for Bucks (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 11:56PM EDT until April 10 at 4:24AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in New Jersey...Pennsylvania... Delaware River At Riegelsville affecting Mercer, Hunterdon, and Bucks Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Delaware River At Riegelsville. * WHEN...From this evening to early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.5 feet, The entrance to Bull Island State Park is closed. Unsafe to cross over to Treasure Island Scout Camp. At 15.0 feet, Treasure Island Scout Camp floods. At 18.0 feet, River Road floods in Pohatcong Township, north of the bridge. At 22.0 feet, Pohatcong Creek floods Creek Road due to high and backwater from the Delaware River. The Musconetcong River also floods Mount Joy Road due to high and backwater from the Delaware River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 PM EDT Friday the stage was 22.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:30 PM EDT Friday was 22.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 23.9 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 23.8 feet on 10/16/1955. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Stream Fld Observed Fcsts (2 am) Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Stg Time Date Delaware River Riegelsville 22.0 22.1 Fri 11 p 20.2 18.1 23.9 8am 4/09 &&
info.instruction: Turn around...don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/phi. The next statement will be issued Saturday afternoon at 1200 PM EDT.
